name: Video Gallery
author: Pluginspoint

sections.description:
Responsive Video Gallery is a very effective WordPress video gallery plugin which allows you to make nice looking video galleries with responsive layouts and customizable styles. It’s very easy to use & manage everything via options page. Need some simple step to create your video gallery.

  • Live Preview
  • Documentation

Plugin Features

  • 100% Responsive.
  • Clean design & code.
  • No coding required.
  • Support video (Youtube, Video, Dailymotion).
  • Unlimited video gallery.
  • Drag & Drop Video Sorting.
  • Unlimited shortcode anywhere.
  • Video column (2,3,4,5,6).
  • Add or remove video by back-end.
  • Video types(youtube, vimeo, dailymotion).
  • Auto Detect video Thumbnail.
  • Video area background color.
  • Support video title.
  • Title color.
  • Title font size.
  • Title text transform.
  • Title text style.
  • Title text alignment.
  • Support video caption.
  • Caption font color.
  • Caption font size.
  • Caption text transform.
  • Caption text style.
  • Video grayscale option.
  • Video height option.
  • Video overlay background color.
  • Video overlay image opacity.
  • Display video by video ID.
  • User friendly option page.
  • etc
sections.installation:
Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Pluings setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After activate plugin you will see “Wp Video Gallery” menu at left side on WordPress dashboard and find “Wp Video Gallery” Settings.

Using FTP
1.Extract wp-responsive-video-gallery.zip to your computer.
2.Upload the wp-responsive-video-gallery directory to your wp-content/plugins directory.
3.After activate plugin you will see “Wp Video Gallery” menu at left side on WordPress dashboard and find “Wp Video Gallery Settings”

How to use short-code?
When Wp Video Gallery setup done please copy & paste shortcode into your theme any where you want to display this Video Gallery.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

Using The WordPress Dashboard

  1. Install as regular WordPress plugin.
  2. Go your Pluings setting via WordPress Dashboard and activate it.
  3. After activate plugin you will see “Wp Video Gallery” menu at left side on WordPress dashboard and find “Wp Video Gallery” Settings.

Using FTP
1.Extract wp-responsive-video-gallery.zip to your computer.
2.Upload the wp-responsive-video-gallery directory to your wp-content/plugins directory.
3.After activate plugin you will see “Wp Video Gallery” menu at left side on WordPress dashboard and find “Wp Video Gallery Settings”

How to use short-code?
When Wp Video Gallery setup done please copy & paste shortcode into your theme any where you want to display this Video Gallery.
